recipe.title: Hummus
recipe.step: Cook chick peas per packet instructions and rinse under cold water when done. Place in blender with all other ingredients except water. Blend and pulse to mix ingredients. While blender running pour in water slowly. Only add enough to get consistency desired ( more water may be added if required.) Pour into dish and decorate with a sprinkle of additional paprika and a sprinkle of olive oil if desired. Serve immediately or after it has been refrigerated a few hours. Serve with crusty bread or your choice of crackers.
